subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: St. Louis starter Adam Wainwright needed only 79 pitches to stymie Mets batters for seven innings, while Matt Holliday erased the Mets’ best offensive effort in one fell swoop.
snippet: St. Louis starter Adam Wainwright needed only 79 pitches to stymie Mets batters for seven innings, while Matt Holliday erased the Mets’ best offensive effort in one fell swoop.
